nodes.text: Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon (deluxe papermodel kit)

Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon is a deluxe paper model kit for building a foot-wide starship model of the Millennium Falcon, complete with LED lights and sound effects. The set also includes the canon reference book Star Wars: Millennium Falcon: Mission Reports, written by Benjamin Harper. It was published by becker&mayer! on September 29, 2015.
